SELECT vlrd_pk, vlrd_padre_pk, vlrd_vlrc_pk, vlrd_vlrl_pk , vlrd_valor_base, vlrd_importe_base, vlrd_importe , vlrd_cuant1, vlrd_cuant2, vlrd_cuant3, vlrd_cuant4, vlrd_cuant5, vlrd_cuant6
, CASE WHEN vlrd_pk = vlrd_padre_pk THEN vlrd_ssrv_pk ELSE (SELECT vlrd_ssrv_pk FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd vlrdPadre WHERE vlrdPadre.vlrd_pk = vlrd.vlrd_padre_pk) END AS vlrd_ssrv_pk , CASE WHEN vlrd_pk = vlrd_padre_pk THEN vlrd_fini ELSE (SELECT vlrd_fini FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd vlrdPadre WHERE vlrdPadre.vlrd_pk = vlrd.vlrd_padre_pk) END AS vlrd_fini , CASE WHEN vlrd_pk = vlrd_padre_pk THEN vlrd_ffin ELSE (SELECT vlrd_ffin FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd vlrdPadre WHERE vlrdPadre.vlrd_pk = vlrd.vlrd_padre_pk) END AS vlrd_ffin
, CASE WHEN vlrd_pk = vlrd_padre_pk THEN vlrd_info1 ELSE (SELECT vlrd_info1 FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd vlrdPadre WHERE vlrdPadre.vlrd_pk = vlrd.vlrd_padre_pk) END AS vlrd_info1 , CASE WHEN vlrd_pk = vlrd_padre_pk THEN vlrd_info2 ELSE (SELECT vlrd_info2 FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd vlrdPadre WHERE vlrdPadre.vlrd_pk = vlrd.vlrd_padre_pk) END AS vlrd_info2 , CASE WHEN vlrd_pk = vlrd_padre_pk THEN vlrd_info3 ELSE (SELECT vlrd_info3 FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd vlrdPadre WHERE vlrdPadre.vlrd_pk = vlrd.vlrd_padre_pk) END AS vlrd_info3 , CASE WHEN vlrd_pk = vlrd_padre_pk THEN vlrd_info4 ELSE (SELECT vlrd_info4 FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd vlrdPadre WHERE vlrdPadre.vlrd_pk = vlrd.vlrd_padre_pk) END AS vlrd_info4 , CASE WHEN vlrd_pk = vlrd_padre_pk THEN vlrd_info5 ELSE (SELECT vlrd_info5 FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd vlrdPadre WHERE vlrdPadre.vlrd_pk = vlrd.vlrd_padre_pk) END AS vlrd_info5 , CASE WHEN vlrd_pk = vlrd_padre_pk THEN vlrd_info6 ELSE (SELECT vlrd_info6 FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd vlrdPadre WHERE vlrdPadre.vlrd_pk = vlrd.vlrd_padre_pk) END AS vlrd_info6
, rgla_pk, rgla_crgo_pk, rgla_codigo, rgla_enti_pk, rgla_tipo
, ssrv_numero, ssrv_tpss_pk, ssrv_srvc_pk
, (SELECT vlrc_fref FROM tbl_valoracion_vlrc WHERE vlrc_pk = vlrd_vlrc_pk) AS vlrd_fref FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd vlrd INNER JOIN tbl_regla_rgla rgla ON EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_valoracion_lin_vlrl WHERE vlrl_pk = vlrd_vlrl_pk AND vlrl_rgla_pk = rgla_pk ) LEFT JOIN tbl_subservicio_ssrv ssrv ON ssrv_pk = vlrd_ssrv_pk
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd LEFT JOIN tbl_subservicio_ssrv ON ssrv_pk = vlrd_ssrv_pk
